Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I love KSP and this forum and now to release a thing. I have me registered on this Forum

I have Play and Mod "Minecraft" for 2-3 Years. Come from germany and life near "Cottbus"

I hope i have some fun on this Forum and can increase my english

Greets

Hello and welcome to KSP! I'm a minecraft modder myself too. People here seem to have a tendency to dislike Minecraft (from what I've seen) but there are some good similarities, especially the "go anywhere do anything" sandbox gameplay. I hope you have a good time on the forums!
